message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this great product to you. I think you'll really like it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I was thinking more like $115. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I think you're undervaluing the product. I can do $105, but I'm getting a bit concerned about selling to you at this point. Can you meet me at $110?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with $110. How about we meet at $102.50?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can do $108, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. This is my final offer, so you'll have to decide now.
